relics.name: Garnet Scales
relics.description: After you play your first Holy card each turn, gain 2 Block.
relics.flavorText: They Pulse with the Warmth of a Dragon's Fury.

relics.name: Wide Potion Belt
relics.description: Upon pickup, gain 1 Potion slot and 1 Wide Potion slot.
relics.flavorText: I can hold even more Potions using this belt!

relics.name: Wide Toy Ornithopter
relics.description:
Whenever you use a potion, heal 5 HP.
If the potion is Wide, heal an additional 5 HP.
relics.flavorText: "This little toy is the perfect companion for the lone adventurer!"

relics.name: Sunlight Fragment
relics.description: The First time you draw a Status each turn draw a card and gain 4 Divine Armor.

relics.name: Wide Beast Statue
relics.description: Potions always appear in combat rewards.
relics.flavorText: A white statue of a wide creature you have never seen before.

relics.name: Tilera's Shield
relics.description: Upon pickup, heal 1 for each relic you have. Whenever you obtain a relic, gain 3 max HP.
relics.flavorText: The Aegis of Great Commander Tilera, It stopped many weapons and armored her in Golden Light.

relics.name: Obsidian Scales
relics.description:
Replaces Garnet Scales.
After you discard a Status or Primal card Gain 2 Block and Vigor
relics.flavorText: Obsidian power, mastery of the flame that ruled the primordial world

relics.name: Sulfurian
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Shuffle 1 Burn into your Discard pile after taking unblocked damage.
relics.flavorText: The Great Mace of the Molten Core, known to incinerate anything.

relics.name: Paper Jragon
relics.description: Scorch Also reduces damage dealt by monsters, and is reduced when they attack.
relics.flavorText: Even the most foolish of mortals knew to fear our ancient might and fury.

potions.name: Draught of Fervor
potions.description: Increase your Holy card damage and block gain by 3

keywords.name: Cycle
keywords.description: Discard a card and draw a new card to replace it.

keywords.name: Divine Burden
keywords.description: Divine Burdens are random debuffs from the following list ; Weak, Vulnerable, Frail, Scorch, Penance, and Constrict

keywords.name: Divine [theDragonkin:LightIcon]
keywords.description: [theDragonkin:LightIcon] Block is Used before other block types and is not lost at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Fire [theDragonkin:FireIcon]
keywords.description: Fire damage applies Scorch equal to half of unblocked damage dealt.

keywords.name: Holy
keywords.description: When played, gain Sacrifice equal to energy spent. Obtaining 10 Sacrifice increases damage and block gain of Holy cards for the rest of combat.

keywords.name: Penance
keywords.description: When a creature obtains 8 Penance, it loses 20 HP and HP loss from this effect is increased by 10 this combat

keywords.name: Primal
keywords.description: Primal Cards generate Vigor equal to the energy spent when played.

keywords.name: Sacrifice
keywords.description: When you obtain 10 Sacrifice, increase the damage and Block of your Holy cards by 1

keywords.name: Scorch
keywords.description: Scorched creatures take damage equal to their scorch and lose 25% of their scorch when Attacked

keywords.name: Sealed
keywords.description: Sealed effects activate whenever you discard a Status or Primal card.

keywords.name: Temporary HP
keywords.description: Temporary HP disappears at the end of combat.

keywords.name: Tribute X
keywords.description:
Tribute effects create a Seal that Activates after you take or block X damage during your turns.
At the end of your turn, if you did not you take or block any damage you will lose 2 HP.

keywords.name: [E]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: Autoplay
keywords.description: This card automatically plays itself when drawn.

keywords.name: Exhaustive
keywords.description: Exhausts after a certain number of uses.

keywords.name: Fetch
keywords.description: Choose a specified card from a specified pile and place it into your hand.

keywords.name: Fleeting
keywords.description: This card Purges and is removed from your deck on use.

keywords.name: Grave
keywords.description: Start each combat with this card in your discard pile.

keywords.name: Purge
keywords.description: Removed until end of combat. Does NOT go to your exhaust pile.

keywords.name: Refund
keywords.description: Returns energy spent on playing the card, up to the Refund value.

keywords.name: Retain
keywords.description: Not discarded at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Snecko
keywords.description: When drawn, this card randomizes its cost.

keywords.name: Soulbound
keywords.description: Cannot be removed from your deck.

keywords.name: Startup
keywords.description: Triggers at the start of each combat.
